word_mean: 糖原：一种多糖，(C6H10O5)x，动物体内储存的主要碳水化物，为一种长链的葡萄糖多聚体，在肝内形成与储存的量最多，少部分形成并储存于肌肉内
需要时可解聚为葡萄糖并释放出来

sentence.Network_en: After the animal is killed, glycogen falls apart into glucose.
sentence.Network_cn: 动物被杀后, 肝糖元分解为葡萄糖.

sentence.Network_en: Background - PRKAG 2 mutations cause glycogen - storage cardiomyopathy, ventricular preexcitation, and conduction system degeneration.
sentence.Network_cn: 背景-PRKAG2突变引起糖原贮积型心肌病, 心室预激和传导系统退化.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To establish a method for measuring glycogen phosphorylase isoenzyme BB ( GPBB ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的建立elisa法测定 糖原 磷酸化酶同工酶BB的方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 糖原（glycogen）（C6H10O5）n又称肝糖，动物淀粉，由葡萄糖结合而成的支链多糖，其糖苷链为α型。动物的贮备多糖。
以肝醣（glycogen）≧7.5毫克/毫升为品管指标成分。 7、保健功效叙述：  根据动物试验结果，对四氯化碳诱发之大鼠肝脏损伤，有助 …
肝糖（glycogen）一种常作为动物性淀粉被提及的多糖；储存在肝脏和肌肉内；构成养分的短期储备。胰岛素（insulin）一种胰腺激素…
糖元（glycogen）又称作糖原，是一类多糖，由葡萄糖失水缩合而成。结构与支链淀粉相似，由α—1，4-糖苷键和支链连接处的α—1…

means.word_mean: 1. one form in which body fuel is stored; stored primarily in the liver and broken down into glucose when needed by the body

auth_sentence.content: If the glucose isn't needed straight away, it's stored as glycogen.
auth_sentence.res_content: If the glucose isn't needed straight away, it's stored as glycogen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the glucose isn't needed straight away, it's stored as glycogen.

auth_sentence.content: Sugars are converted into glycogen or fat for storage, or kept as glucose in the blood for use in the body's cells.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sugars are converted into glycogen or fat for storage, or kept as glucose in the blood for use in the body's cells.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sugars are converted into glycogen or fat for storage, or kept as glucose in the blood for use in the body's cells.

auth_sentence.content: When the body needs energy fast - when you're running, for example - the glycogen is turned back to glucose and used by the body.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the body needs energy fast - when you're running, for example - the glycogen is turned back to glucose and used by the body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the body needs energy fast - when you're running, for example - the glycogen is turned back to glucose and used by the body.
